1.「おおっ！ ツリーの飾りつけは| バッチリじゃねえか！: Oh! The Tree is all decorated!

2.「……だが まだ ほかの準備は| 完璧ってワケじゃあ なさそうだな。: But I'm not sure I'm ready for the rest of it|yet.

3.「うーん……惜しいモン。ごちそうの準備も| まだみたいだし あと ちょーっと|: Well...that's a shame. They haven't prepared|the feast yet, and there's still a little work|to be done.

4.「おーい！ アンタたち ヒマか！？| もし 手が空いているようだったら オレの仕: Hey! You guys free? If you're free, you can|help me with my work.

5.「オレ 調子に乗ってたみたいでよぉ。| ひとりじゃ さばけない量の仕事を| 引き: I was in a good mood. I was taking on more|work than I could handle on my own.

6.「だから 誰か 手の空いてるヤツに| オレの分の星夜祭の仕事を 手伝ってほしいと:
So I'm hoping someone who has some free time|will help me with my portion of the Hoshi Yoru|Festival work, but it seems like everyone has|
|too much to do.

7.「オレは あっちで準備をしてるから| 気が向いたら 手伝ってくれよ。なっ！: I'm getting ready over there, so help me out|if you feel like it. Hey!

8.「あの 慌てよう……よっぽど困っているんだな。| お前さん よかったら アイツの: He must be in a panic...he must be in a lot of|trouble. If you don't mind, could you help him|out?

9.「僕も それがいいと思うモン！ みんなでやれば| 星夜祭の準備も すぐに終わるモ:
I think that's a good idea! If we all work|together, the preparations for the Starry|Night Festival will be over soon! I want to|
|help out too, if I can!

10.「ああ～っ！ ちょっと待って ほしいモン！| まだ キミの願望を かなえてあげて: Aaahhh! Wait a minute! I want you to wait a|minute! I haven't given you what you wanted|yet!

11.「今から キミに魔法をかけてあげるモン～！| モンモン～～ モシャス～ン！！: Now I'm going to cast a spell on you! Monsieur|Monsieur Morphin!

12.「みんな 楽しそうにしてるじゃねえか。: You guys look like you're having a good time.

13.「<pc>……お前さんのおかげで| 無事に 星夜祭が 始められたぜ。| これは:
...Thanks to you, we were able to|start the Starry Night Festival without a|hitch. This is a thank you from me. Please|
|accept it.

14.「それにしても 魔物たちが こんなに| 一生懸命やってくれるなんてな。| 星夜祭: I can't believe the monsters are working so|hard. I'm sure you'll have fun with me at the|Starry Night Festival.
